name: Mahjong Royal Towers, Mahjong World Contest, Mahjong Gold
name_original: Mahjong Royal Towers, Mahjong World Contest, Mahjong Gold
description:
Mahjong Royal Towers
Play Mahjong and experience royal generosity for yourself!

Mahjong World Contest
Take part in a Mahjong contest. Plunge yourself into the myriads of golden tiles!

Mahjong Gold
Join in the search for Long John Silver's buried treasure in this Mahjong pirate adventure!

Mahjong Royal Towers

Compatible with PlayStation®Vita only.
Gameplay requires PlayStation®Vita memory card (sold separately).
10240KB minimum space required
1 Player
